settings.review_text: I didn’t expect such a difference! These muslin pillowcases feel airy and soft, and I no longer wake up sweaty at night. Total game changer for light sleepers.
The fabric feels so gentle on my skin. After a few washes, it’s even softer. I have sensitive skin, and these are the only ones that don’t irritate me.
They look so elegant and feel amazing. I sleep cooler and wake up without those pillow lines on my face anymore.
